verses.verse: In his <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> came <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> <S%H1961>became<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years:<s%> then he <S%H7725>turned<s%> and <S%H4775>rebelled<s%> against him.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> against <S%H853>him<s%> <S%H1416>bands<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldees,<s%> and <S%H1416>bands<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians,<s%> and <S%H1416>bands<s%> of the <S%H4124>Moabites,<s%> and <S%H1416>bands<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> them against <S%H3063>Judah<s%> to <S%H6>destroy<s%> it, according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets.<s%>

Surely <S%H389><s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> this upon <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> to <S%H5493>remove<s%> them out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H5921><s%> his <S%H6440>sight,<s%> for the <S%H2403>sins<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he <S%H6213>did;<s%>

And <S%H1571>also<s%> for the <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he <S%H8210>shed:<s%> for he <S%H4390>filled<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> with <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood;<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5545>pardon.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he <S%H6213>did,<s%> are <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah?<s%>
So <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> his <S%H1>fathers:<s%> and <S%H3078>Jehoiachin<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> any <S%H5750>more<s%> out of his <S%H4480>land:<s%> <S%H776><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> had <S%H3947>taken<s%> from the <S%H4480>river<s%> <S%H5104><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H4480>river<s%> <S%H5158><s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1961>pertained<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

Jehoiachin <S%H3078><s%> was <S%H8083>eighteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign,<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H2320>months.<s%> And his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H5179>Nehushta,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H494>Elnathan<s%> of <S%H4480>Jerusalem.<s%> <S%H3389><s%>
And he <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> had <S%H6213>done.<s%>

At <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H935>besieged.<s%> <S%H4692><s%>

And <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and his <S%H5650>servants<s%> did <S%H6696>besiege<s%> <S%H5921><s%> it.

And <S%H3078>Jehoiachin<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H1931>he,<s%> and his <S%H517>mother,<s%> and his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and his <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and his <S%H5631>officers:<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> him in the <S%H8083>eighth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign.<s%>

And he carried <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and cut in <S%H7112>pieces<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> in the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>said.<s%>

And he carried <S%H1540>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> even <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1540>captives,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2796>craftsmen<s%> and <S%H4525>smiths:<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H7604>remained,<s%> <S%H2108>save<s%> the poorest <S%H1803>sort<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And he carried <S%H1540>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3078>Jehoiachin<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H517>mother,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H802>wives,<s%> and his <S%H5631>officers,<s%> and the <S%H352>mighty<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> those <S%H1980>carried<s%> he into <S%H1473>captivity<s%> from <S%H4480>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H3389><s%> to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H2428>might,<s%> even <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and <S%H2796>craftsmen<s%> and <S%H4525>smiths<s%> a <S%H505>thousand,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that were <S%H1368>strong<s%> and <S%H6213>apt<s%> for <S%H4421>war,<s%> even them the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H1473>captive<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H4427>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4983>Mattaniah<s%> his father's <S%H1730>brother<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead,<s%> and <S%H5437>changed<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> to <S%H6667>Zedekiah.<s%>

Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign,<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H259>eleven<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> And his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H2537>Hamutal,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> of <S%H4480>Libnah.<s%> <S%H3841><s%>

And he <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> had <S%H6213>done.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H5921>through<s%> the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he had cast them <S%H7993>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> his <S%H6440>presence,<s%> that <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4775>rebelled<s%> against the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>
